snippet.title: Mars First Logistics - Official Early Access Release Announcement Trailer | Day of the Devs 2023
snippet.description: Mars First Logistics is an open-world physics sim set in a burgeoning space colony. Players can build mechanized rovers and transport awkwardly shaped cargo across rugged terrain on their mission to help the Martians establish a new home. Earn funds, unlock new parts, and use your ingenuity to craft wild and ambitious creations. Mars First Logistics is launching in Steam Early Access on June 22 for PC.
